title: Robinne Lee Takes Us Behind The Scenes of The Idea Of You
itunes:title: Robinne Lee Feeds Our Obsession Over The Idea of You
description:
We’re back already, because we have a very exciting bonus guest: Robinne Lee, the author of The Idea Of You. We talk about the inspiration behind the book, a possible movie adaptation, and (most importantly) if there will be a sequel.

Make sure to follow Robinne on Instagram and Twitter (@robinnelee) and leave The Idea of You a shining review on Goodreads and Amazon. 

Books Mentioned

  • The Idea of You
  • Some Kind of Magic
  • The Wild Woman’s Guide to Traveling the World
  • Daisy Jones and the Six

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast

itunes:subtitle: Author, Actress, Musician and Mother Robinne Lee graces us with her presence, where we demand a sequel to The Idea of You!
itunes:author: Grace Atwood and Becca Freeman
